include(ExternalProject)

ExternalProject_Add(
  tomlplusplus
  URL "https://github.com/marzer/tomlplusplus/archive/master.zip"
  INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/vendor"
  CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
  BUILD_COMMAND ""
  INSTALL_COMMAND
  COMMAND "${CMAKE_COMMAND}" -E copy "<SOURCE_DIR>/toml.hpp" "<INSTALL_DIR>/include")
